items.title: Worx’s unique + safer 20V JawSaw cordless electric PowerShare chainsaw with retractable blade at $119 (Reg. $170)
items.summary:
Update 2/05: Amazon has dropped the price on Worx’s 20V JawSaw even further to $118.70 shipped.

Over at Amazon, you can currently find the Worx 20V JawSaw Cordless Electric PowerShare Chainsaw with 2.0Ah battery at $132.22 shipped. Coming down from its full $170 rate, giving you a 22% markdown on a more unique and even safer outdoor cutting solution that protects you far more than traditional chainsaws, especially when using it directly on the ground. While we have seen it go lower in the past, today’s deal lands the price just $3 above its Black Friday rate, giving you a solid $38 savings in the process. You can find a number of the brand’s other lawn care tools at discounted rates in the official Amazon storefront here.

more…

items.summary:
As part of Heybike’s ongoing Valentine’s Day e-bike sale, we wanted to shine a spotlight on the brand’s dual e-bike combo offers, the most notable being two ALPHA All-Terrain Mid-Drive e-bikes at $1,998 shipped. You’ll currently find a single of these e-bikes at its lowest $1,299 pricing right now during this sale, which normally goes for $1,699 at full price – meaning this bundle would normally fetch $3,398 without any discounts. What makes this deal especially nice – aside from being able to ride with your loved on on separate e-bikes – is that with its current pricing, they come out to be $999 each. That’s $300 less per e-bike than you’ve ever been able to score on a single model, and happens to be the best price we have tracked for two of them to date. Head below to learn more about it and the other models benefiting from bundled savings.

items.title: Bluetti Elite 400 portable power station returns to second-ever exclusive $1,221 low (Reg. $1,899), more from $379
items.summary:
Bluetti currently has up to 55% discounts running across its lineup of power stations, and we wanted to shine a spotlight on some of the best picks here today – all complete with exclusive 5% and 6% savings codes for our readers. To start, one of the most notable collection of deals is on Bluetti’s newest Elite 400 Portable Power Station that starts from $1,221.06 shipped for the standalone station, after using the exclusive code 9TO5TOYS6OFF that only works for this series at checkout. Thanks to the extra savings, this deal even beats out its Amazon pricing by $78. While it is listed with a $2,699 MSRP, you’ll more often find it down at $1,899 on most given days, with the last (and only other) time we saw it come down this low being during the brand’s Christmas sale. Now, you’re getting a second chance at $678 off its going rate (and $1,478 off the MSRP), letting you add it to your traveling and at-home needs for the best price we have tracked in its history since hitting the market in November. Head below for more on this and three variant models that are our favorite picks for bolstered backup support from this brand – all starting from $379 with the codes.
